title: DOSbox.GUI.Modified.and.ready2use.VREALQRELEASE.rar
description:
---------VIRTUAL REALITY STUDIOS QUALITY RELEASES---------


Source: www.dosbox.com (DOSBox 0.76) and(D.O.G 1.53)
Installed by: LoveWarez
Uploaded and released by: LoveWarez.


Welcome to this VREAL QUALITY RELEASE. 
Quality releases are always tested and viruscanned to ensure you optimal experience! This is not free... It costs a big and nice THANKS!
Well, not really, but it is appreciated. (Also, remember to SEED!)

Tested on: Windows Vista. 

--
What is this?: This is a DOS emulator to play all DOS games optimally. However, DOSBox is a console-program, which means that it has no GUI. Many have developed custom GUIs for DOSBox - one of them is Erikgg with the GUI: D.O.G, which I&#039;ve chosen, as I think it has all the advanced functions there are needed to play the games. You can choose  fullscreen in this GUI in the settings. Try play around with it a little. 

Instructions:

1. Extract the .rar file. It works out of the box. 
2. To run DOSbox, run: "DOG.exe". It has an already made profile, so you wont need to configure it. 
3. The already made profile is configured to run the VREALQRELEASE of Warcraft II from C: . 
4. If you want to run another DOS game, or run Warcraft II from another path, edit the profile and choose the filepath in that window - also, you can choose to play in "fullscreen" in the options.
5. Enjoy! 

- Shraring is Caring!
